        <name>evalute if current date is before 2 days</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[// Get the current date
var currentDate = new GlideDate();

// Subtract 2 days from the current date
var twoDaysAgo = new GlideDateTime();
twoDaysAgo.addDays(-2);
gs.info(twoDaysAgo);

// Get the date to evaluate (replace 'your_date_field' with the actual field name containing the date)
var dateToEvaluate = new GlideDateTime('2024-05-26');

// Check if the date to evaluate is before 2 days ago
if (dateToEvaluate.before(twoDaysAgo)) {
    gs.info('The date is before 2 days from today.');
} else {
    gs.info('The date is not before 2 days from today.');
}
]]></script>
